com.github.timoteoponce.paginator
Class PaginationData

java.lang.Object
  com.github.timoteoponce.paginator.PaginationData
All Implemented Interfaces:
SegmentProvider, java.io.Serializable
public class PaginationData
extends java.lang.Object
implements SegmentProvider, java.io.Serializable

Base model component for pagination operations, this component calculates the list segments and handles page-transitions.

Author:
Timoteo Ponce, Rory Sandoval - original implementation
See Also:
